sqlMap.select: select ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE, ZC_DIYU_DAIMA, ZC_YEAR, ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME, ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE_PAR, ZC_CATALOGUE_TYPE, ZC_QUOTA, ZC_METRIC_UNIT, ZC_IS_VITAL, ZC_IS_USED, ZC_TARGET_TYPE, ZC_PINMU_CTLG, ZC_IS_CGZX_ZG, ZC_IS_GENERAL, ZC_YEAR_PAR, ZC_QUOTA_UNIT, ZC_CG_LEIXING, ZC_ZCGZ_STD, ZC_IS_ASSERT,ZC_JJ_PP_NUM,ZC_JJ_PRICE_QUOTA from ZC_B_CATALOGUE order by ZC_YEAR,ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE

select c.zc_type_code, c.zc_type_code_par, c.zc_type_name, c.zc_catalogue_code, c.zc_orderby, LEVEL LEVELS from zc_portal_catalogue c start with c.zc_type_code_par is null connect by prior c.zc_type_code = c.zc_type_code_par order siblings by c.zc_orderby

select c.zc_type_code, c.zc_type_code_par, c.zc_type_name, c.zc_catalogue_code, c.zc_orderby from zc_portal_catalogue c where c.zc_type_code not in(select distinct(t.zc_type_code_par) from zc_portal_catalogue t where t.zc_type_code_par is not null) order by c.zc_orderby

select c.zc_catalogue_name, c.zc_catalogue_code from zc_b_catalogue c where c.zc_catalogue_code in (select distinct(zc_catalogue_code) from zc_zb_pinp where zc_su_code = #zcSuCode#) order by c.zc_catalogue_code

select ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE, ZC_DIYU_DAIMA, ZC_YEAR, ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME, ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE_PAR, ZC_CATALOGUE_TYPE, ZC_QUOTA, ZC_METRIC_UNIT, ZC_IS_VITAL, ZC_IS_USED, ZC_TARGET_TYPE, ZC_PINMU_CTLG, ZC_IS_CGZX_ZG, ZC_IS_GENERAL, ZC_YEAR_PAR, ZC_QUOTA_UNIT, ZC_CG_LEIXING, ZC_ZCGZ_STD, ZC_IS_ASSERT,ZC_JJ_PP_NUM,ZC_JJ_PRICE_QUOTA from ZC_B_CATALOGUE where ZC_YEAR=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy') order by ZC_YEAR,ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE

select * from ( select cata.ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE, cata.ZC_DIYU_DAIMA, ctg.zc_diyu_name, cata.ZC_YEAR, cata.ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME, cata.ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE_PAR, zc.zc_catalogue_name ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME_PAR, cata.ZC_CATALOGUE_TYPE, cata.ZC_QUOTA, cata.ZC_METRIC_UNIT, cata.ZC_IS_VITAL, cata.ZC_IS_USED, cata.ZC_TARGET_TYPE, cata.ZC_PINMU_CTLG, cata.ZC_IS_CGZX_ZG, cata.ZC_IS_GENERAL, cata.ZC_YEAR_PAR, cata.ZC_QUOTA_UNIT, cata.ZC_CG_LEIXING, cata.ZC_ZCGZ_STD, cata.ZC_IS_ASSERT, cata.zc_is_dianzi_toubiao, cata.ZC_JJ_PP_NUM, cata.ZC_JJ_PRICE_QUOTA from ZC_B_CATALOGUE cata,zc_diyu_ctg ctg, (select zc_catalogue_code,zc_catalogue_name,ZC_YEAR from ZC_B_CATALOGUE )zc where cata.ZC_DIYU_DAIMA=ctg.zc_diyu_daima(+) and cata.zc_catalogue_code_par(+)=zc.zc_catalogue_code and zc.ZC_YEAR=cata.zc_year
union all
select cata.ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE, cata.ZC_DIYU_DAIMA, ctg.zc_diyu_name, cata.ZC_YEAR, cata.ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME, null, null, cata.ZC_CATALOGUE_TYPE, cata.ZC_QUOTA, cata.ZC_METRIC_UNIT, cata.ZC_IS_VITAL, cata.ZC_IS_USED, cata.ZC_TARGET_TYPE, cata.ZC_PINMU_CTLG, cata.ZC_IS_CGZX_ZG, cata.ZC_IS_GENERAL, cata.ZC_YEAR_PAR, cata.ZC_QUOTA_UNIT, cata.ZC_CG_LEIXING, cata.ZC_ZCGZ_STD, cata.ZC_IS_ASSERT, cata.zc_is_dianzi_toubiao, cata.ZC_JJ_PP_NUM, cata.ZC_JJ_PRICE_QUOTA from ZC_B_CATALOGUE cata,zc_diyu_ctg ctg where cata.ZC_DIYU_DAIMA=ctg.zc_diyu_daima(+) and cata.zc_catalogue_code_par is null) catalogue
order by catalogue.ZC_YEAR desc, catalogue.ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE
sqlMap.insert:
insert into ZC_B_CATALOGUE ( ZC_DIYU_DAIMA, ZC_IS_USED, ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE, ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME, ZC_YEAR, ZC_CATALOGUE_TYPE, ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE_PAR, ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME_PAR, ZC_IS_DIANZI_TOUBIAO, ZC_IS_VITAL, ZC_JJ_PP_NUM, ZC_JJ_PRICE_QUOTA ) values ( #zcDiyuDaima:VARCHAR#, #zcIsUsed:VARCHAR#, #zcCatalogueCode:VARCHAR#, #zcCatalogueName:VARCHAR#, #zcYear:VARCHAR#, #zcCatalogueType:VARCHAR#, #zcCatalogueCodePar:VARCHAR#, #zcCatalogueNamePar:VARCHAR#, #zcIsdianZitouBiao:VARCHAR#, #zcIsVital:VARCHAR#, #zcJjPpNum:DECIMAL#, #zcJjPriceQuota:DECIMAL#
)
sqlMap.update: delete ZC_B_CATALOGUE zbc where zbc.zc_year=#zcYear:VARCHAR# and zbc.zc_catalogue_code=#zcCatalogueCode:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ZC_B_CATALOGUE where 1=1
zc_year=#zcText0#
zc_catalogue_code=#zcText1#
